data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during PLUTO cruise from Samarang to Batavia started at 1805-10-05
Ship: Pluto, Voyage: Samarang - Batavia, 1st Observer: Melville Van Carnbee (Kapitein), 2nd Observer: Hancock, Company: MAR
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
